translation.add-markdown-content-to-fix-this-block: Add Markdown content to <1>fix this block</1>.
translation.add-project-metadata: <1>Add project metadata</1> to fix this block.
translation.add-resources-or-resource-collections: Add <1>resources</1> or <2>resource collections</2> to the project to fix this block.
translation.add-texts-to-block-or-adjust-block-confi: <1>Add texts to the project</1> or <2>adjust the block configuration</2> to fix this block.
translation.dont-fret: But don't fret, it's easy to start following projects. Just browse through the available projects, and when you find one you like, select the green plus symbol. When the green plus is replaced with a blue checkmark, you're done!
translation.empty-projects-message: <1>But it’s easy to create and publish projects with Manifold. If you have backend access, <2>head to the backend</2> and select <3>Add a New Project</3>. For more help, you can learn about creating and publishing Manifold Projects <4>here</4>.</1>
translation.follow-projects-alt: A cursor icon hovers over a project thumbnail illustration, which depicts a stack of papers, a pencil, a speech bubble, and a pair of glasses. The cursor clicks on a green plus icon to demonstrate how to follow a project. When clicked, the icon changes into a blue checkmark.
translation.no-activity-has-been-recorded: No activity has been recorded for this project. This warning will disappear once there is project activity.
translation.not-following-anything: You’re not following any projects yet
translation.note-this-message-is-only-visible-to-edi: Note: This message is only visible to project editors.
translation.page-not-found-text: The page you're looking for was not found.
translation.powered-by-manifold-scholarship-learn-mo: Powered by Manifold Scholarship. Learn more at
translation.search-across-all-content-and-projects: Search across all content and projects
translation.specify-text-to-fix-block: Specify a text to <1>fix this block</1>.
translation.this-content-bleck-needs-your-attention: This content block needs your attention before it can be displayed.
translation.this-text-does-not-have-a-table-of-conte: This text does not have a table of contents.
translation.uh-oh-library-empty: Uh-oh. This Manifold library is empty.

contact-form.success: Thank you. We’ve received your message.
contact-form.error: We seem to have run into a problem.
